SEARCH
Package it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.server

Interface ServerRemoteInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerSideMethods, ServerSideRMI
public interface ServerRemoteInterface extends Remote
Interface listing the methods exposed by the server to rmi users

  • Method Details

    • login

      Boolean login(String name, int playerNumber, String mode, int port) throws RemoteException
      login method for rmi users which intend to create a new match
      Parameters:
      name - player's nickname
      playerNumber - decided player number for the match
      mode - use "easy" for easy mode, "normal" for normal mode; else will not be accepted and it will return false
      port - the port used to open the client registry
      Returns:
      boolean value indicating whether the login was successful or not
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote exception

    • login

      Boolean login(String name, int port) throws RemoteException
      login method for rmi users which intend to join an existing match
      Parameters:
      name - player's nickname
      port - the port used to open the client registry
      Returns:
      boolean value indicating whether the login was successful or not
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote exception

    • localLogin

      Boolean localLogin(String name, int port) throws RemoteException
      login method for rmi users which intend to join an existing match (local use only)
      Parameters:
      name - player's nickname
      port - the port used to open the client registry
      Returns:
      boolean value indicating whether the login was successful or not
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote exception

    • localLogin

      Boolean localLogin(String name, int playerNumber, String mode, int port) throws RemoteException
      login method for rmi users which intend to create a new match (local use only)
      Parameters:
      name - player's nickname
      playerNumber - decided player number for the match
      mode - use "easy" for easy mode, "normal" for normal mode; else will not be accepted and it will return false
      port - the port used to open the client registry
      Returns:
      boolean value indicating whether the login was successful or not
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote exception

    • sendMessageToAll

      void sendMessageToAll(String message, String sender) throws RemoteException
      method used to send a chat message to all
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be displayed by the clients
      sender - the sender of the message
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(String message, String nickName, String sender) throws RemoteException
      method used to send a chat message to a specified client
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be displayed by the clients
      nickName - the nickname of the receiver
      sender - the sender of the message
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • ping

      responds with a boolean value to indicate the client that the connection is still good

      boolean value
      Throws:
